citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:50 am on
20-FEB-19.
Knocking on door and call and leave a business card. This is the first attempted to accompany the inspector on an
animal welfare inspection.
